Package camzup.pfriendly

Class ZShader

java.lang.Object
processing.opengl.PShader
camzup.pfriendly.ZShader
All Implemented Interfaces:
processing.core.PConstants
public class ZShader extends processing.opengl.PShader
Extends Processing's PShader to provide support for Cam Z-up core objects: Vec2, Vec3, Vec4, Quaternion, Mat3 and Mat4.

  • Method Details

    • set

      public void set(String name, Color c)
      Sets a GLSL vec4 uniform to a color. The alpha channel is treated as the w component.
      Parameters:
      name - the uniform name
      c - the color

    • set

      Parameters:
      name - the uniform name
      m - the matrix
